snippet: A demonstration against American drone strikes inside Pakistan’s tribal belt was abandoned after the military warned of “imminent danger,” but thousands rallied at a safer location.
abstract: Imran Khan, Pakistani cricket star turned opposition politician, leads anti-drone march to edge of the South Waziristan tribal agency, then returns to town of Tank; demonstration was originally intended for tribal town of Kotkai, but was abandoned after Pakistani Taliban warned that militants would attack the convoy.

byline.contributor: Declan Walsh contributed reporting from Sindh Province, and Ihsanullah Tipu Mehsud from Tank.

lead_paragraph: A demonstration against American drone strikes inside Pakistan’s tribal belt was abandoned after the military warned of “imminent danger,” but thousands rallied at a safer location.

headline.seo: In Pakistan, Drone Protest Takes Detour For Safety
headline.main: In Pakistan, Drone Protest Takes Detour for Safety
headline.print_headline: In Pakistan, Drone Protest Takes Detour For Safety
